name: AVMIDIPlayer
desc: An object that plays MIDI data through a system sound module.

items.name: init(contentsOf: URL, soundBankURL: URL?)
items.desc: Creates a player to play a MIDI file with the specified soundbank.

items.name: init(data: Data, soundBankURL: URL?)
items.desc: Creates a player to play MIDI data with the specified soundbank.

items.name: func prepareToPlay()
items.desc: Prepares the player to play the sequence by prerolling all events.

items.name: var isPlaying: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the sequence is playing.

items.name: var rate: Float
items.desc: The playback rate of the player.

items.name: var currentPosition: TimeInterval
items.desc: The current playback position, in seconds.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration, in seconds, of the currently loaded file.
